A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a Star Wars fan since my Dad popped in \"A New Hope\" into the VCR. As I continued to grow\, so did my love for the universe. Lightsaber duels in Walmart with my friends\, getting lost in the marvel that was Knights of the Old Republic on Xbox... but it seems time to let go of the fandom. \n\nI felt no connection to the force while watching this movie. I wish that I had felt joy\, anger or even disgust... but instead I felt nothing. This was the last Star Wars movie I'll be seeing in theaters. Into exile I must go.
